title: jobs at rito sydney???
body:
are there any jobs available for rito in syd ? i havent seen one in quite awhile and i want to get more involved in this game i feel like even a part time jobs as a pr person for the boards would be great ..... i don't even mind not being paid i just would like to see a rito post more often to feel like we are heard and someone is listening to us.
the community can grow and be a better place but its something we seem to need some nurturing and i feel like as it stands lots of players are feeling left out.
the boards are great but maybe just letting a few people help with the game, anyone out there got exp with how to detect bots?
maybe some players have coding exp and can help there?

I know the community is large and we are but a small part of it .

i feel like i dont really see alot of rito post these days but the other regions seem to have alot more.

is there anything we can do to help this?


Thanks for any and all input guys
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
